de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.BaseController
      • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>

    public class GameController
extends BaseController
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
    Author:
    Benjamin Wulfert, Leonard Reidel

    The GameCanvasController manages the state of the game canvas - it also contains the game-logic for realizing the snake-game.

    TODO: document every method and every member TODO: reduce for-loops TODO: make config setable externally TODO: implement multiple scores (their needs to be one for every player)

      • update

        private void update(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
        The update-loop of the game. Gets called every TICK_TIME_AMOUNT until someone wins or some other kind of rule is fulfilled.
        Parameters:
        gc - - The graphics context in order to draw something on the canvas
